title: Nominate someone to collect State Pension

details.description: Find out how to nominate someone to collect your State Pension for you
details.body:
Contact your account provider to nominate someone to collect your State Pension.

Most banks, building societies or other account providers allow a third party access to your account (eg with a second card).

Contact your bank, building society or other account provider for more information.

Lasting Power of Attorney

If you’re no longer able to make decisions on your behalf, and you want to nominate someone to get your State Pension on a more permanent basis then you’ll need to set up a Lasting Power of Attorney.
